Headline: Green Line Delays
ShortDescription: Green Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier signal problems at Harlem. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Green Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier signal problems at Harlem.
Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Update: #20 Madison Temporary Westbound Reroute near Madison/Leavitt
ShortDescription: Update: WB 20 Madison buses are temporarily rerouted via Madison, Western, Jackson, Damen, and Madison due to, police activity near Madison/Leavitt.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #20 Madison buses are temporarily rerouted via Madison, Western, Jackson, Damen, and Madison due to, police activity near Madison/Leavitt.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
